About Me

Unix and QA Engineer with over 10 years of experience supporting mission-critical systems in a Linux/Unix environment. Skilled in scripting (Bash, Python, SQL), with strong background in system testing, release management, and troubleshooting. Proven ability to document processes, train staff, and translate complex technical issues into actionable solutions. Hands-on experience in automation, monitoring, and performance optimization.

I am most skilled in: Problem solving and Getting things done

Investment Technology Group
